title: Ep 254: Esther Povitsky and the Amazon Prime Time Meltdown
itunes:title: Ep 254: Esther Povitsky and the Amazon Prime Time Meltdown
description:
Bobby and Whitney gang up with medical advice. Esther shares something with Larry King. Khalyla makes two dinners. We talk watching Alone together vs watching Alone Together, Dr. Zhivago vs Dr. Kevorkian, and a butt to butt with Bobby dream. 

www.patreon.com/tigerbelly
